Two-day course organized by the German Region of the International Biometric Society. Takes place in Lambrecht, Germany.

2019/01: Introduction to statistics in clinical trials
item.description: Two-hour course for Medical Science Liaison group, Roche Swiss Affiliate, Reinach.

item.title: Joint modelling of progression-free and overall survival and computation of correlation measures
item.description: This project was initiated within a four month full-time internship at Department of Biostatistics, Roche Basel. The academic supervisor was Jan Beyersmann, University of Ulm. The project became Matthias Meller’s MSc thesis with which he won the Bernd Streitberg Award 2018 of the German Region of the International Biometric Society.
